The header name.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-interval">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/healthcheck.ts#L337">property <b>interval</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>interval?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The interval between each health check. Shorter intervals may give quicker notifications if the origin status changes, but will increase load on the origin as we check from multiple locations. (Default: `60`)

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-method">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/healthcheck.ts#L341">property <b>method</b></a>

The TCP connection method to use for the health check. Valid values: `connectionEstablished` (Default: `connectionEstablished`).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-modifiedOn">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-name">

A short name to identify the health check. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens and underscores are allowed.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-notificationEmailAddresses">

A list of email addresses we want to send the notifications to.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-notificationSuspended">

Whether the notifications are suspended or not. Useful for maintenance periods. Valid values: `true` or `false` (Default: `false`).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-path">

The endpoint path to health check against. (Default: `/`)

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-port">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/healthcheck.ts#L362">property <b>port</b></a>

Port number to connect to for the health check.  Valid values are in the rage `0-65535` (Default: `80`).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-retries">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/healthcheck.ts#L366">property <b>retries</b></a>

The number of retries to attempt in case of a timeout before marking the origin as unhealthy. Retries are attempted immediately. (Default: `2`)

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-suspended">

If suspended, no health checks are sent to the origin. Valid values: `true` or `false` (Default: `false`).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="HealthcheckState-timeout">

The timeout (in seconds) before marking the health check as failed. (Default: `5`)

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs" data-link-title="LoadBalancerArgs">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-defaultPoolIds">

A list of pool IDs ordered by their failover priority. Used whenever region/pop pools are not defined.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-description">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-enabled">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-fallbackPoolId">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-name">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-popPools">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L290">property <b>popPools</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>popPools?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#LoadBalancerPopPool'>LoadBalancerPopPool</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

A set containing mappings of Cloudflare Point-of-Presence (PoP) identifiers to a list of pool IDs (ordered by their failover priority) for the PoP (datacenter). This feature is only available to enterprise customers. Fields documented below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-proxied">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L294">property <b>proxied</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>proxied?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether the hostname gets Cloudflare's origin protection. Defaults to `false`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-regionPools">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L298">property <b>regionPools</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>regionPools?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#LoadBalancerRegionPool'>LoadBalancerRegionPool</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

A set containing mappings of region/country codes to a list of pool IDs (ordered by their failover priority) for the given region. Fields documented below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-sessionAffinity">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L302">property <b>sessionAffinity</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>sessionAffinity?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Associates all requests coming from an end-user with a single origin. Cloudflare will set a cookie on the initial response to the client, such that consequent requests with the cookie in the request will go to the same origin, so long as it is available.  Valid values are: `""`, `"none"`, `"cookie"`, and `"ipCookie"`.  Default is `""`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-steeringPolicy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L306">property <b>steeringPolicy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>steeringPolicy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determine which method the load balancer uses to determine the fastest route to your origin. Valid values are: `"off"`, `"geo"`, `"dynamicLatency"`, `"random"` or `""`. Default is `""`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-ttl">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L310">property <b>ttl</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>ttl?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Time to live (TTL) of this load balancer's DNS `name`. Conflicts with `proxied` - this cannot be set for proxied load balancers. Default is `30`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerArgs-zoneId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L314">property <b>zoneId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>zoneId: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The zone ID to add the load balancer to.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs" data-link-title="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs">

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>LoadBalancerMonitorArgs</span></code></pre>

The set of arguments for constructing a LoadBalancerMonitor resource.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-allowInsecure">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L267">property <b>allowInsecure</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>allowInsecure?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Do not validate the certificate when monitor use HTTPS. Only valid if `type` is "http" or "https".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L271">property <b>description</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Free text description.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-expectedBody">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L275">property <b>expectedBody</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>expectedBody?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

A case-insensitive sub-string to look for in the response body. If this string is not found, the origin will be marked as unhealthy. Only valid if `type` is "http" or "https". Default: "".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-expectedCodes">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L279">property <b>expectedCodes</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>expectedCodes?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The expected HTTP response code or code range of the health check. Eg `2xx`. Only valid and required if `type` is "http" or "https".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-followRedirects">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L283">property <b>followRedirects</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>followRedirects?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Follow redirects if returned by the origin. Only valid if `type` is "http" or "https".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-headers">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L287">property <b>headers</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>headers?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#LoadBalancerMonitorHeader'>LoadBalancerMonitorHeader</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

The header name.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-interval">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L291">property <b>interval</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>interval?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The interval between each health check. Shorter intervals may improve failover time, but will increase load on the origins as we check from multiple locations. Default: 60.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-method">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L295">property <b>method</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>method?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The method to use for the health check. Valid values are any valid HTTP verb if `type` is "http" or "https", or `connectionEstablished` if `type` is "tcp". Default: "GET" if `type` is "http" or "https", or "connectionEstablished" if `type` is "tcp" .

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-path">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L299">property <b>path</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>path?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The endpoint path to health check against. Default: "/". Only valid if `type` is "http" or "https".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-port">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L300">property <b>port</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-retries">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L304">property <b>retries</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>retries?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The number of retries to attempt in case of a timeout before marking the origin as unhealthy. Retries are attempted immediately. Default: 2.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-timeout">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L308">property <b>timeout</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>timeout?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The timeout (in seconds) before marking the health check as failed. Default: 5.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerMonitorArgs-type">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerMonitor.ts#L312">property <b>type</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>type?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The protocol to use for the healthcheck. Currently supported protocols are 'HTTP', 'HTTPS' and 'TCP'. Default: "http".

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs" data-link-title="LoadBalancerPoolArgs">
    <a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L211">
        interface <strong>LoadBalancerPoolArgs</strong>
    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>LoadBalancerPoolArgs</span></code></pre>

The set of arguments for constructing a LoadBalancerPool resource.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-checkRegions">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L215">property <b>checkRegions</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>checkRegions?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

A list of regions (specified by region code) from which to run health checks. Empty means every Cloudflare data center (the default), but requires an Enterprise plan. Region codes can be found [here](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000540888-Load-Balancing-Geographic-Regions).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L219">property <b>description</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>description?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Free text description.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-enabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L223">property <b>enabled</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>enabled?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to enable (the default) this origin within the Pool. Disabled origins will not receive traffic and are excluded from health checks. The origin will only be disabled for the current pool.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-minimumOrigins">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L227">property <b>minimumOrigins</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>minimumOrigins?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The minimum number of origins that must be healthy for this pool to serve traffic. If the number of healthy origins falls below this number, the pool will be marked unhealthy and we will failover to the next available pool. Default: 1.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-monitor">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L231">property <b>monitor</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>monitor?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The ID of the Monitor to use for health checking origins within this pool.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-name">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L235">property <b>name</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>name: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

A human-identifiable name for the origin.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-notificationEmail">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L239">property <b>notificationEmail</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>notificationEmail?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The email address to send health status notifications to. This can be an individual mailbox or a mailing list. Multiple emails can be supplied as a comma delimited list.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolArgs-origins">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L243">property <b>origins</b></a>

The list of origins within this pool. Traffic directed at this pool is balanced across all currently healthy origins, provided the pool itself is healthy. It's a complex value. See description below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolState-checkRegions">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L169">property <b>checkRegions</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>checkRegions?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

A list of regions (specified by region code) from which to run health checks. Empty means every Cloudflare data center (the default), but requires an Enterprise plan. Region codes can be found [here](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/115000540888-Load-Balancing-Geographic-Regions).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolState-enabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L181">property <b>enabled</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>enabled?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Whether to enable (the default) this origin within the Pool. Disabled origins will not receive traffic and are excluded from health checks. The origin will only be disabled for the current pool.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerPoolState-minimumOrigins">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancerPool.ts#L185">property <b>minimumOrigins</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>minimumOrigins?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The minimum number of origins that must be healthy for this pool to serve traffic. If the number of healthy origins falls below this number, the pool will be marked unhealthy and we will failover to the next available pool. Default: 1.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-popPools">

A set containing mappings of Cloudflare Point-of-Presence (PoP) identifiers to a list of pool IDs (ordered by their failover priority) for the PoP (datacenter). This feature is only available to enterprise customers. Fields documented below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-proxied">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L240">property <b>proxied</b></a>

Whether the hostname gets Cloudflare's origin protection. Defaults to `false`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-regionPools">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L244">property <b>regionPools</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>regionPools?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#LoadBalancerRegionPool'>LoadBalancerRegionPool</a>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

A set containing mappings of region/country codes to a list of pool IDs (ordered by their failover priority) for the given region. Fields documented below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-sessionAffinity">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L248">property <b>sessionAffinity</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>sessionAffinity?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Associates all requests coming from an end-user with a single origin. Cloudflare will set a cookie on the initial response to the client, such that consequent requests with the cookie in the request will go to the same origin, so long as it is available.  Valid values are: `""`, `"none"`, `"cookie"`, and `"ipCookie"`.  Default is `""`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-steeringPolicy">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L252">property <b>steeringPolicy</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>steeringPolicy?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determine which method the load balancer uses to determine the fastest route to your origin. Valid values are: `"off"`, `"geo"`, `"dynamicLatency"`, `"random"` or `""`. Default is `""`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-ttl">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/loadBalancer.ts#L256">property <b>ttl</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>ttl?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Time to live (TTL) of this load balancer's DNS `name`. Conflicts with `proxied` - this cannot be set for proxied load balancers. Default is `30`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="LoadBalancerState-zoneId">

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>RateLimitArgs</span></code></pre>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-action">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-bypassUrlPatterns">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L245">property <b>bypassUrlPatterns</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-correlate">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L249">property <b>correlate</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>correlate?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#RateLimitCorrelate'>RateLimitCorrelate</a>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determines how rate limiting is applied. By default if not specified, rate limiting applies to the clients IP address.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L253">property <b>description</b></a>

A note that you can use to describe the reason for a rate limit. This value is sanitized and all tags are removed.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-disabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L257">property <b>disabled</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-match">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L261">property <b>match</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>match?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#RateLimitMatch'>RateLimitMatch</a>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determines which traffic the rate limit counts towards the threshold. By default matches all traffic in the zone. See definition below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-period">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L265">property <b>period</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>period: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The time in seconds to count matching traffic. If the count exceeds threshold within this period the action will be performed (min: 1, max: 86,400).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-threshold">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L269">property <b>threshold</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>threshold: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The threshold that triggers the rate limit mitigations, combine with period. i.e. threshold per period (min: 2, max: 1,000,000).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitArgs-zoneId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L273">property <b>zoneId</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>zoneId: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The DNS zone ID to apply rate limiting to.

<h3 class="pdoc-module-header" id="RateLimitState" data-link-title="RateLimitState">

    </a>
</h3>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kr'>interface</span> <span class='nx'>RateLimitState</span></code></pre>

Input properties used for looking up and filtering RateLimit resources.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-action">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L199">property <b>action</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>action?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#RateLimitAction'>RateLimitAction</a>&gt;;</code></pre>

The action to be performed when the threshold of matched traffic within the period defined is exceeded.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-bypassUrlPatterns">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L203">property <b>bypassUrlPatterns</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>bypassUrlPatterns?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

URLs matching the patterns specified here will be excluded from rate limiting.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-correlate">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L207">property <b>correlate</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>correlate?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#RateLimitCorrelate'>RateLimitCorrelate</a>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determines how rate limiting is applied. By default if not specified, rate limiting applies to the clients IP address.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L211">property <b>description</b></a>

A note that you can use to describe the reason for a rate limit. This value is sanitized and all tags are removed.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-disabled">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L215">property <b>disabled</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-match">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L219">property <b>match</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>match?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/cloudflare/types/input/#RateLimitMatch'>RateLimitMatch</a>&gt;;</code></pre>

Determines which traffic the rate limit counts towards the threshold. By default matches all traffic in the zone. See definition below.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-period">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L223">property <b>period</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>period?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The time in seconds to count matching traffic. If the count exceeds threshold within this period the action will be performed (min: 1, max: 86,400).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-threshold">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L227">property <b>threshold</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>threshold?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The threshold that triggers the rate limit mitigations, combine with period. i.e. threshold per period (min: 2, max: 1,000,000).

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="RateLimitState-zoneId">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/rateLimit.ts#L231">property <b>zoneId</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneArgs-plan">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneArgs-type">

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>initialSettingsReadAt?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>
<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneSettingsOverrideState-readonlySettings">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zoneSettingsOverride.ts#L149">property <b>readonlySettings</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>readonlySettings?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

Which of the current `settings` are not able to be set by the user. Which settings these are is determined by plan level and user permissions.
* `zoneStatus`. A full zone implies that DNS is hosted with Cloudflare. A partial zone is typically a partner-hosted zone or a CNAME setup.
* `zoneType`. Status of the zone. Valid values: active, pending, initializing, moved, deleted, deactivated.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-nameServers">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L154">property <b>nameServers</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>nameServers?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

Cloudflare-assigned name servers. This is only populated for zones that use Cloudflare DNS.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-paused">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L158">property <b>paused</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>paused?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Boolean of whether this zone is paused (traffic bypasses Cloudflare). Default: false.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-plan">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L162">property <b>plan</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>plan?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The name of the commercial plan to apply to the zone, can be updated once the one is created; one of `free`, `pro`, `business`, `enterprise`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-status">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L166">property <b>status</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>status?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Status of the zone. Valid values: `active`, `pending`, `initializing`, `moved`, `deleted`, `deactivated`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-type">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L170">property <b>type</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>type?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

A full zone implies that DNS is hosted with Cloudflare. A partial zone is typically a partner-hosted zone or a CNAME setup. Valid values: `full`, `partial`. Default is `full`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-vanityNameServers">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L176">property <b>vanityNameServers</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>vanityNameServers?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of Vanity Nameservers (if set).
* `meta.wildcard_proxiable` - Indicates whether wildcard DNS records can receive Cloudflare security and performance features.
* `meta.phishing_detected` - Indicates if URLs on the zone have been identified as hosting phishing content.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-verificationKey">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L180">property <b>verificationKey</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>verificationKey?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Contains the TXT record value to validate domain ownership. This is only populated for zones of type `partial`.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="ZoneState-zone">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-cloudflare/blob/382161c02b4c39987265f9795b06cf25a263ca26/sdk/nodejs/zone.ts#L184">property <b>zone</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>zone?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The DNS zone name which will be added.
